original_text: Jehoiada the priest ordered the commanders of units of a hundred, who were in charge of the troops: “Bring her out between the ranks and put to the sword anyone who follows her.” For the priest had said, “She must not be put to death in the temple of the Lord.”
korean_text: 제사장 여호야다가 군대를 거느린 백부장들에게 명령하여 이르되 그를 대열 밖으로 몰아내라 그를 따르는 자는 모두 칼로 죽이라 하니 제사장의 이 말은 여호와의 성전에서는 그를 죽이지 말라 함이라

sentences.original_text: the commanders of units of a hundred
who were in charge of the troops
Bring her out between the ranks
and put to the sword anyone who follows her
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀를 따르는 자는 누구든지 칼로 죽이라

sentences.original_text: She must not be put to death
in the temple of the Lord
